parameters:
\N<Painter>I travel around painting pictures and sell them to make a
living.

\N<Painter>I'm not from this town... I managed to avoid participating
in the military drills, but it looks like I'll be staying
here for a while.

\N<Painter>Well, it's a good opportunity. I'll take this time to
confront my own work and talent.
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>
\N<Segi>Um... I've read the request board at the management office.
\N<Painter>You have? Are you going to accept my request?
\N<Segi>Yes. Am I not capable enough to help?
\N<Painter>Hmm... no, not at all. You're more than capable.

\N<Painter>Besides, it's not a particularly difficult job. I have no
intention of asking about your experience either.
\N<Segi>Is that so? That's a relief. So... um, what should I do...?

\N<Painter>Well then, let's get to work right away. Could you come over
here?
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Painter>What I want from you is nothing less than to be a model for
a nude painting.

\N<Painter>Of course, I'll pay you accordingly. And I promise not to
lay a single finger on your body.

\N<Segi>W-wait a minute, please... A nude painting, that's...! I
can't do... such a thing...

\N<Painter>You can't? Are you saying you refuse? That would be...
problematic. It would cause significant delays in
production...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>...Understood, let's do this. There's no need to take off
your clothes. Can you just get on the bed as you are?
\N<Segi>Just as I am...?

\N<Painter>Yes, that would be fine, wouldn't it? Please... I'm begging
you.

\N<Segi>...Understood. Since I've already accepted the offer, if
that's the case...
i_1_セギ05uu
i_1_セギ05u
\N<Segi>Um... may I ask you something?

\N<Painter>...Yes, of course. It must be boring for you to just lie
there.
i_1_セギ05a

\N<Segi>...Thank you. It's strange for me to ask after accepting
such an offer, but I just can't seem to understand the taste
for art...

\N<Segi>However, you seem very passionate and committed to your
dream. Why... can you be so earnest?

\N<Painter>The reason I pour my dreams into art...? Indeed, that's a
valid question. But I'm sorry to disappoint you with a
simple answer.

\N<Painter>It's to satisfy my feelings with things I find beautiful. To
fill this hungry and empty heart with my own aesthetic
sense.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>I've traveled to various places in search of things and
phenomena that could satisfy my creative desires. In that
sense, this town has what I'm looking for.
\N<Segi>This town has...? What do you mean by that...?

\N<Painter>The hearts of the people living in this town swirl with
suppressed emotions stemming from being occupied by the
Ryuda soldiers. Especially for a woman as attractive as
you...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>It's the sight of such charming women gritting their teeth
and yet living each day with determination that I find
appealing.

\N<Painter>And I want to capture that image not as something ephemeral
but as something universal... in other words, give it form.
Do you understand this feeling?
\N<Segi>...No, I don't quite understand...

\N<Painter>Heh, that's fine. As long as you fulfill your role, I will
pay you your reward.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>Is this... all right for the end?

\N<Painter>Ah, thank you. I'm grateful to you. It looks like it will
turn out to be a good piece thanks to you.
\N<Segi>...No.

\N<Painter>Here is the promised reward. Please accept it without
reservation.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>However... it's still far from the true form I seek. If
you're willing, I would very much like your cooperation
again.
\N<Segi>I can't promise anything... but I'll consider it.
A
\N<Segi>Um...

\N<Painter>Ah, madam. Does your presence here mean that I can interpret
it as you accepting another job?
\N<Segi>...Yes.
\N<Painter>That's wonderful. Actually, I've been waiting for you.
\N<Segi>You've been... waiting for me?

\N<Painter>Yes. Once I started painting you as a model, I naturally
wanted you to stay with me until the very end.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>So... shall we continue from where we left off last time?

\N<Painter>Of course, I will pay you accordingly. And just like last
time, I promise not to lay a finger on your body.
\N<Segi>...Yes.
i_1_セギ05uu
i_1_セギ05u
\N<Segi>May I... ask you something?
\N<Painter>Yes, please feel free to ask anything.
i_1_セギ05a

\N<Segi>How long will it take to complete the painting you're
working on now? I... don't have any knowledge or experience
in this area, so I'm just asking out of curiosity.

\N<Painter>Well... it's hard to say definitively, but with today's
work, we should be about halfway there, I suppose.
\N<Segi>I see... that's good to hear.
\N<Painter>...
\N<Segi>...

In front of the bed, the man took his position and continued
to work on his painting. A moment of silence passed between
Segi and him.

\N<Painter>...Now, may I indulge myself and have you listen to my
story?
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Painter>...Indeed, thanks to you, my brush has made significant
progress. But recently, I've been thinking. My heart sounds
an alarm. That this cannot continue as is.
\N<Segi>What... do you mean by that?

\N<Painter>Did I not tell you before? My true purpose is to express the
beautiful melancholy of the women in this town.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>After all... I cannot call it a true completion if I avoid
what I truly want to create.
\N<Segi>...?

\N<Painter>So here's my proposal. No, I'm not asking you to expose your
skin. Instead... could you at least lower the underwear
you're wearing right now?
\N<Segi>Y-Yes...!?

\N<Painter>Don't misunderstand me. As I've said many times, I'm not
asking you to expose yourself.

\N<Painter>Did I not say earlier? I want to capture the repressed
emotions that fill this town... especially the sorrowful
feelings hidden within women.

\N<Painter>And you are a very beautiful woman. The expression you show
while enduring shame... that's the impulse I want to capture
in my painting.
\N<Segi>But...

\N<Painter>I understand if you can't make an immediate decision. My
request must be causing you great confusion.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Understood, let's add some color to the reward. Please
understand. This is purely for the sake of creation. There's
no indecent intention whatsoever.

\N<Painter>Besides... as promised, I will not touch you with even a
finger. How about it then...?
\N<Segi>...

Segi thought that might indeed be true. The man's eyes
before her seemed, in a way, not to be looking at her own
figure. It felt as if he was gazing not at her, but at his
own work of art.

Ever since the Ryuda troops were stationed in this town, she
had been subjected to lustful stares many times... But the
eyes of the man before her seemed different from those
vulgar gazes.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Segi>I will have to decline adding color to the reward...
Otherwise, it would make my actions seem like indecent
behavior motivated by money...

\N<Segi>Of course... originally, I accepted your request because of
the reward.

\N<Segi>But that doesn't mean I intend to offer my body and seek
more money than desired.
\N<Painter>Then...?
\N<Segi>...
i_1_セギ05b
\N<Segi>...Is this acceptable?

\N<Painter>Yes... I am grateful. Your expression... it's more than I
had hoped for.
\N<Segi>Please stop speaking like that.

Segi reached for her clothing and lowered her pure white
underwear to her knees. Shame and sorrow inevitably surfaced
on her face. And that was precisely the scene the man had
desired.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>...Are you nervous? It must be difficult to lower your
underwear in front of a man who is almost a stranger, isn't
it?
\N<Segi>Of course... it's inevitable. It couldn't be otherwise...

\N<Painter>My apologies. Then, to distract yourself, would you mind
talking about yourself this time?
\N<Segi>About me...?

\N<Painter>Yes. Knowing the background of the person helps add depth to
the creation they model for.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>Your family? Are they well?
\N<Segi>Yes... I have a husband and one son.

\N<Painter>A son... that's good, wonderful. So you are a wife... and a
mother as well.
\N<Segi>...?

The man's eyes held a smoldering colorless light. Segi could
not understand what that light signified.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>A beautiful married woman like you, alone with a man in a
small room, on a bed, exposing her skin... I wonder what
kind of face your son would make if he saw this scene...

\N<Segi>Please stop. Don't talk like that. If you're going to say
strange things... I will stop right now.

\N<Painter>Ah, my apologies. It just slipped out. It's a bad habit of
mine. However... the incongruity between your background and
your current actions does indeed enhance your allure, and
that is also a fact.

\N<Painter>I am simply excited by that charm... I hope you can
understand.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>I must capture that charm without missing anything, and then
commit it to canvas. That's all there is to it. So please,
rest assured on your part as well.

\N<Painter>This is by no means infidelity. It is purely work. Just a
task to fulfill what has been requested of me. There is no
need for shame.

\N<Segi>...I understand. I have no intention of committing
infidelity either.
\N<Painter>Yes... that's fine. Shall we finish up the rest then?
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>Is this... the end?

\N<Painter>Ah, thank you. I am grateful to you. It seems we will end up
with a fine piece of work thanks to you.
\N<Segi>...No. In exchange...
\N<Painter>Ah, of course. I swear to keep today's matter confidential.

\N<Segi>...? I thought I had declined the offer to add a bonus to my
compensation?

\N<Painter>Please don't say that and accept it. This is purely a token
of my appreciation. It's not something for you to worry
about.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>However... we are still far from the true form I seek. If
you are willing, I would very much like your cooperation
again.
\N<Segi>I can't make any promises, but... I'll consider it.
OriginMenuStatus SetParam param2 Gloomy
A
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Ah, madam. May I take it that you will accept more work
then?
\N<Segi>...Yes.

\N<Painter>I am relieved. This piece has become unimaginable without
you. You are that significant to me.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>Then... shall we continue from where we left off last time?

\N<Painter>Of course, I will pay a proper reward. And just like last
time, I promise not to lay a finger on your body.
\N<Segi>...Yes.
i_3_セギ01u
\N<Segi>May I... ask you something?
\N<Painter>Yes, anything. If it will ease your mind.
i_3_セギ01a

\N<Segi>...You mentioned before that the progress of the work was
about halfway... how is it now?

Segi lies down on the bed with a puzzled expression,
revealing her underwear in response to the man's request,
just as she did before.

She seems to have developed some resistance compared to
before, but she is far from being accustomed enough to feel
nothing at all.

\N<Painter>Ah, that matter. It must be on your mind. Actually... most
of it is complete, but embarrassingly, I am a little
troubled with the direction.
\N<Segi>Direction...?

\N<Painter>No need to worry. Since you are taking time out of your
valuable schedule to assist me, I will make sure to create
something satisfactory.
\N<Segi>Ah, no... it's not that I...

How many times has this happened? A strange silence flows
between Segi and the man who is moving his brush before her
eyes.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>I must say, you as a model are impeccable. If that's the
case, then the problem lies with my own skills.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>To have a perfect model and environment and still not be
able to produce a satisfactory piece... it's truly shameful
on my part.

\N<Segi>Honestly, I don't quite understand such matters... but it
must be difficult.

\N<Segi>Not that I'm one to speak, but perhaps it would be better
not to overdo it...
\N<Painter>...
\N<Segi>...

The man seemed to be pondering something with a troubled
look. Eventually, he stopped his brush and spoke.

\N<Painter>You may be right. Perhaps I have been overdoing it. The
frustration of not being able to solve a problem even when I
know its cause.
\N<Segi>...?

\N<Painter>Yes... there's no point in hiding it any longer. I have a
request for you, though it's embarrassing to ask.
\N<Segi>...What is it?
\N<Painter>Could you take off your clothes... and change into this?
\N<Segi>Eh...!?

The man suddenly handed something to Segi. It was a large,
white robe-like garment that had been hanging in the corner
of the room.
\N<Segi>Th-that is...!?

\N<Painter>Please don't misunderstand. There's absolutely no ulterior
motive. It's purely for the sake of my art.

\N<Painter>Of course, I'm not asking you to expose your bare skin. You
may cover yourself with this.
\N<Segi>But...

\N<Painter>I simply wish to glimpse what lies behind your
embarrassment. I believe that only then can I truly express
myself as I desire.
\N<Painter>What do you say?
\N<Segi>...
I understand.
I can't do that.
了承する
\N<Segi>Understood...

She didn't necessarily trust him, but she could imagine that
the man wasn't lying.

The funds needed for her husband's rescue, and a
satisfactory result for the man's creative work. Segi
convinced herself to accept the man's proposal, considering
the weight of both sides of the scale.
\N<Segi>Wait, please, in exchange...
\N<Painter>Of course, I promise. This will be our little secret.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>How is it? Are you done changing?
\N<Segi>...Yes.
\N<Painter>Good, then let us begin, shall we?
\N<Segi>...
i_3_セギ01b
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>Madam... how do you feel? Is there still... resistance?
\N<Segi>...Of course. There's no way I could be pleased with this...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>I am aware that I am forcing you to do something difficult.
However, I ask you to bear with it a little longer.

She was covered only by her underwear and a large cloth,
lying vulnerably on the bed.

The fragile sense of insecurity and embarrassment brought a
strange and enchanting expression to Segi's face that was
hard to describe.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Yes, that's it. That expression is exactly what I've been
seeking. It's what I needed for my creation.

\N<Painter>With that... I can truly immerse myself in this creation.
Yes... I shouldn't have forgotten my original purpose.
\N<Painter>What my work was missing... was a sense of tragedy.
\N<Segi>A sense of tragedy...?

\N<Painter>Having such an excellent subject as you before me, it seems
I had lost sight of my original goal. I am deeply grateful
to you. My thanks cannot be expressed enough.
\N<Segi>It's not like... Besides...

\N<Painter>Ah, my apologies. My hand had stopped. It seems I was a bit
excited.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>(That's right... The sense of tragedy she radiates. That's
what was missing from my work.)
\N<Painter>(If that's the case, then... for that purpose...)
\N<Segi>Is this... the end?

\N<Painter>Yes, thank you. I am grateful to you. It seems like it will
turn out to be a good piece thanks to you.
\N<Segi>...No. In exchange...

\N<Painter>Ah, of course. I swear today's matter will not be spoken of
elsewhere.

\N<Segi>...? I thought I declined the offer to add a bonus to my
compensation?

\N<Painter>Please don't say that and accept it. This is purely a token
of my feelings. It's not something for you to worry about.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>However... I'm still far from what I truly seek. If you're
willing, I would very much like your cooperation again.
\N<Segi>I can't promise anything... but I'll consider it.
OriginMenuStatus SetParam param2 Gloomy
A
それは出来ない

\N<Segi>I must refuse. I'm sorry, but that's something I cannot
do...

\N<Painter>Is that so... It can't be helped. It's not an act that can
be forced, so I shall give up gracefully.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>Is this... the end then?

\N<Painter>Yes, thank you. I am grateful to you. It seems like it will
turn out to be a good piece thanks to you.
\N<Segi>...No. In exchange...

\N<Painter>Ah, of course. I swear today's matter will not be spoken of
elsewhere.

\N<Painter>...I should be able to manage the rest on my own. Thank you.
I am grateful to you.
\N<Segi>...
A
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Ah, madam. You've come again. I was actually worried about
you, as you seemed to have some concerns the last time.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>But I'm glad. It's reassuring to see you've come back here
again. As I mentioned before, my work is unimaginable
without you now.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>So... shall we continue from where we left off last time?

\N<Painter>Of course, I will pay a proper reward. And just like last
time, I promise not to lay a finger on your body.
\N<Segi>...Yes.
i_3_セギ01b
\N<Painter>...
\N<Segi>...

Just like before, Segi undressed, wrapped her body in the
white cloth prepared by the man, and lay down on the bed.
Waiting for this, the man began to move his brush.

\N<Painter>...It must be boring just lying there. So, may I ask about
yourself just for fun?
\N<Segi>About me...? But I believe I've already told you before...

\N<Painter>No, indeed you have, but if it's not too much trouble, I'd
like to know a bit more deeply.

\N<Segi>What do you intend to do with that knowledge? And... is it
really necessary?

\N<Painter>Well... as you say, it's not necessarily so, but let's say
it's needed for this occasion.
\N<Segi>...

The man's intentions were unclear, but hoping to alleviate
the discomfort of the situation even slightly, Segi began to
open up.

\N<Segi>I am... fighting in the training army in place of my husband
who is not here due to certain circumstances.
\N<Painter>Oh...? A woman like you... must have had quite a hard time.

\N<Painter>Ah, I see. So that's why you accepted a request from someone
like me, as a means of support.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Your dedication to your family is commendable. However, I
surmise that fighting among such strong warriors must be
extremely harsh.

\N<Painter>That... how have you managed to survive through such harsh
battles?
\N<Segi>That is...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>...I see. A double-edged spiritual medicine that strengthens
the body and mind but also affects both physically and
mentally.

\N<Painter>So, about that matter of Mind. Ryuda, did you actually
experience any effects or abnormalities in your body or mind
after taking it?

\N<Segi>...I rarely feel it myself, but perhaps that's why I'm doing
something like this now.
\N<Painter>...I see.

The man suddenly began to ponder something. Then, after a
while, he raised his face and opened his mouth towards Segi.

\N<Painter>Now it all makes sense. If that's the case, it's very
convenient for me that you took that spiritual medicine, and
I can only be grateful.
\N<Segi>Grateful... you say?

\N<Painter>Yes... So you have such circumstances. It was indeed good to
confirm.

\N<Painter>My choice was not mistaken. What will happen from now on
will be for both your sake and mine. I am relieved.
\N<Segi>Eh...?
\N<Segi>Wha...!!??
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Heh, sorry to keep you waiting. Are you doing it?
\N<Segi>Who are you...!? What is this...!?

\N<Painter>Ah, as you can see, these are Ryuda soldiers. They agreed
readily when I explained the situation to them.
i_4_セギ03u
\N<Segi>The situation...!? What on earth are you talking about!?
i_4_セギ03a

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Heh, sorry for the suddenness, ma'am, but not just the
painter sensei here, how about you entertain us too?
\N<Segi>Wha...!!??

Suddenly, a group of Ryuda soldiers burst through the door
and forcefully entered the room. They restrained the
flustered Segi in a bear hug and began to strip off their
own clothes as well.
\N<Segi>No, stop... please stop! What on earth is this...!?

Segi turned back to the painter and questioned him loudly.
However, the painter responded very calmly, in stark
contrast to her.

\N<Painter>Unfortunately, I cannot stop them. Because this is something
I myself have requested. Besides... you are terribly
attractive right now.
\N<Segi>You requested this...!? What are you talking about...!?

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Heh, when this sensei told us he wanted a certain woman
violated, I wondered what was going on.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Ah, it's truly a stroke of luck. To think I'd get to bed a
fine woman like you and even get paid for it, right, painter
sensei?

\N<Painter>Yes, of course I'll pay. I want you to fully indulge your
desires with her.
\N<Segi>Eh...!!??

\N<Ryuda Soldier>That's right, ma'am. No use resisting now, just give up and
let it happen quietly.
\N<Segi>Such...!! Wait...!?
i_4_セギ03b
\N<Segi>Wha...!!??

The Ryuda soldiers held Segi in a bear hug and pulled down
her underwear. In an instant, Segi's scream echoed through
the cramped room.
\N<Segi>No... nooo...!!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Heh, you're the wife rumored to be in the training army,
right? Showing up in such an erotic outfit in front of
everyone... I've been wanting to do you for a while now.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Exactly, it's an eyesore to see such things. But who
would've thought my wish would come true here.
i_4_セギ03c
\N<Segi>...!
\N<Segi>Stop... stop...!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You can't dress like that and then say stop now? Plus,
coming to a room with a man alone means you were expecting
this to happen, weren't you?

\N<Segi>Don't be ridiculous...! Who would willingly...! This is
just... a request...!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>A request huh? Well, we have a request too. Right? A
splendid request to violate you.
\N<Segi>Ha...ah...!? Stop...no...ah...!
\N<Ryuda Soldier>How is it, Painter Sensei? How does it feel?
\N<Painter>Ha, haha... It's the best, beyond my expectations.
i_4_セギ04u
\N<Segi>Ha...ah...! Ah!
i_4_セギ04a
\N<Segi>Ah...nh! Haa! Nnh! Ah...huff!

\N<Painter>Ah... It's the best, truly beyond expectations. It seems I
made the right decision in commissioning you guys.

It was a terribly bizarre scene. The painter, with a faint
smile on his face, watched Segi cry out in violation and
continued to move his brush.
\N<Segi>Nn...nnh! No more...stop...nnh!

\N<Painter>The face of a beautiful woman filled with desperation and
tears, and her heated body...haha... Madam, I thank you
again. Thanks to you, it seems I can create a good piece
this time...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hehe, is that so? That's great. So, Painter Sensei, aren't
you going to join in?

\N<Painter>That's not what I'm focused on right now... I want to
concentrate.

The painter's words were no lie. He did not participate in
the violation himself, nor did he stop it; he simply kept
moving his brush.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hehe, what an odd guy. Then I'll concentrate on my work
without holding back.
\N<Segi>Ah! Ah! Haa...nnn!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hey, Painter Sensei. The madam is putting her body on the
line like this, make sure you finish up a good piece,
alright?
\N<Painter>Of course... I don't need you to tell me that.
\N<Segi>It was all a lie...wasn't it!? Everything you said...!!

\N<Painter>There's no doubt that you are the best material for me. And
the fact that you showed me the best expressions by doing
this is also as expected. There's no lie in that.

In response to Segi's tearful questioning, the painter began
to eloquently sing praises while still moving his brush.

\N<Painter>However... it's true that I had some concerns about doing
this. Because I thought it might hurt you, your husband, or
your son.
\N<Segi>Then...ah! Ahn! Stop it right now...haa...stop...!

\N<Painter>But those concerns were unfounded. The so-called spirit
medicine took care of them.

\N<Painter>Because... isn't it so? By doing this act, you can release
your sexual urges. And I get the best material.

\N<Painter>Fu, fufu... Isn't this what they call killing two birds with
one stone? Right?
\N<Segi>Ah! Haa! Don't joke...!

\N<Painter>So... I want you to show me everything about yourself. And I
will capture that figure without missing a thing.

\N<Painter>Fu, fufu...fufu... This is it... This is what I've been
seeking...
\N<Segi>You're crazy... This is madness... You are...you are...!
セギ半裸_困る
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>...Are you okay physically? You have children, after all.
I've told them not to be too reckless.
セギ半裸_困る
\N<Segi>...You're insane... You are insane...

\N<Painter>Perhaps that's true. Even if it weren't, you have every
right to denounce me.
\N<Painter>And... you also have the right to receive a proper reward.
セギ半裸_怒り
\N<Segi>I don't need it... Such dirty money...

\N<Painter>Whether it's clean or dirty, money is money. You should
accept it graciously.

Lying on the bed, Segi closed her eyes deeply. The tragedy
that had befallen her in this place days ago resurfaced in
her mind. Then she quietly opened her mouth.

\N<Segi>...You must be an excellent artist. But as a person, you're

No matter how much I try not to remember, the events that
happened here come back to me, and my body stiffens without
realizing it.

As if seeing right through my heart, the man in front of me
who continues to paint speaks up.

\N<Painter>Ah, please relax. There's no need to be so tense. Those
people will not come here anymore. They have served their
purpose.

\N<Painter>It's just the two of us here. And unlike those men from
before, I will never hurt you.

\N<Segi>...Words are cheap. How can I trust what you say after all
that has happened?
\N<Segi>First of all... do you even realize that you've hurt others?
